Notes

Can you imagine a BluRay having chroma subsampling artifact? Yes it can, this one has and only zEROS can do it; the name is enough. (Ladies can PM me to know what that is!)
It can't be fully removed without washing out frames (which would mess up the HD details), but we at DDR have taken care of it and have minimized it by atleast 80% keeping the HD details intact.
As usual, brought out fine details which were muted in the source.
This film was shot with heavy film grains, we have kept it that way, it looks more natural and eye-pleasing.
P.S.: The grains remained intact even after detail enhancing, they are not over-exploited; because we didn't sharpen the full frame, we just enhanced the fine details present in the frame (unlike the ladies).
Luma was messed up here, heavy whites; we adjusted it. Minimal work done on chroma as well.
AC3 audio along with spell-checked subtitles & named chapters.
Again, DDR serves you with superior quality release. Enjoy!

Desperate ladies, all gone? Forget me not. Psych!
And, it ain't bragging, if it's true.


All the information provided above are accurate and not tampered with, because we share what we show!
